List the admin credentials for the private cloud

Azure REST API version: 2023-09-01.

Other available API versions: 2022-05-01, 2023-03-01.

These versions are not included in the SDK but you can generate them as a local SDK package; see the [version guide](../../../version-guide/#accessing-any-api-version-via-local-packages) for details.




## Using listPrivateCloudAdminCredentials {#using}

arguments and either blocks until the result value is available, or
returns a Promise-wrapped result. The output form accepts
Input-wrapped arguments and returns an Output-wrapped result.

        <span id="vcenterpassword_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#vcenterpassword_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">vcenter<wbr>Password</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>vCenter admin password</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="vcenterusername_yaml">

        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>vCenter admin username</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
